knimeNode.name: Download
knimeNode.shortDescription: Download file or folder from a server.

fullDescription.intro: This node downloads a file or folder from the server specified by the connection information and outputs a table with the references to the local files.
fullDescription.option: Location of the file or folder on the server.

How the path of the source files will be truncated.
Use full path
Use the full path without truncating anything.
Use only filename
Truncate the whole path and leave only the file's name.
Truncate prefix
Truncate the selected prefix directory from the path.
Directory that will be truncated from the sources path.
Where the downloaded files will be put.

How to handle already existing files.
Overwrite
Overwrite the existing file.
Overwrite if newer
Overwrite the existing file only, if the file on the server is newer.
Abort
Abort the execution of the node.

ports.inPort: Port object containing the connection information to the server.
ports.outPort: Table containing the list of files that have been downloaded and if they have been downloaded or were already up to date.
